Text: I don't read alternative non-Earth 616 comics (except for What Ifs), but that cover looks really nice.
Well, from a guy who just got into the Ultimate universe - start at the beginning, it all builds on itself. So even if you just start this volume at #1 your be a little lost

Thanks for the head's up. But that kind of makes me definitely not want to start with Ultimates. I don't want to hunt down each comic and learn a whole new universe (although that's what I did with DC comics).
